Pre-Game Insights: The Philadelphia Phillies seek to maintain a six-game win streak against the Miami Marlins.
The Phillies have a 7-4 advantage in their season series against the Marlins.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Marlins are 26-47 at home and 52-89 overall.
The Phillies are 85-56 overall and 38-31 in road games.
The Phillies have a strong record when not allowing home runs.
Others: Top performers include Jake Burger and Derek Hill for the Marlins, and Kyle Schwarber and Bryce Harper for the Phillies.
The Marlins are 5-5 in their last 10 games, while the Phillies are 8-2.
